GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.120
GSD.description:
pipe: Fix missing lock in pipe_resize_ring()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.120 by commit 8fbd54ab06c955d247c1a91d5d980cddc868f1e7, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c73be61cede5882f9605a852414db559c0ebedfd. For more details please see the references link.
